name: Magus O-Minus
description: Play as the Magus O-Minus, a blood mage who has dedicated themselves to saving those afflicted with bloodlust by feeding them health in exchange for boosts to attacks and speed. In this world your health is everything and the more you have on you the more ravenous monsters become towards you, while villagers will demand to be fed again at every resting point. Make your way to the end while keeping as many villagers alive as possible! Can you make it to the end with 6 villagers?
